articles.title: EU revives bloc-wide travel with COVID-19 pass but Delta poses threat - Global Times
articles.description: An EU-wide COVID-19 certificate for easier travel comes into force on Thursday, just in time for Europe's busy summer vacation period, but the more-infectious Delta variant is already threatening to curtail its use.
articles.content:
People sit on the beach in the old seaside village of Boccadasse in Genoa, northwestern Italy, on Wednesday. Photo: AFP

articles.author: Emily Ferguson
articles.title: Brexit LIVE: EU powergrab begins as French CEO pulls UK operation - gloats at 'new trend' - Daily Express
articles.description: A LEADING banking firm has pulled its UK operation in favour of another European base, with its French CEO gloating he's joining a 'new trend' of firms deciding to leave London.

articles.title: Switzerland, 8 European Union members approve Covishield for Green Pass - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The European Union's Digital COVID certificate or "Green Pass" is set to be rolled out on July 1 with an aim to facilitate free movement during the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
At least seven European countries including, Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Greece, Iceland, Ireland and Spain, and Switzerland have approved the Covishield COVID-19 vaccine for 'Green Pass'.
